Description:
Application Engineer IIOverview:-CMADS Applications development team is responsible for providing custom solutions across Aerospace using Data analytics, Visualization, Automation, and Web development Skills.Technical knowledge and Responsibilities EssentialDevelop automated solutions through computer programming in Python, PowerShell, C-Sharp, SQL, Visual Basic, Java, C++, C object-oriented languages
Design and Develop automation artifacts (scripts, functions, scenarios, processes) for simple to complex automated situations using various tools (e.g., Selenium / Application Lifecycle Management)
Provide design solutions adapted to the underlying requirements based on a thorough analysis
Communicate status to key stakeholders and senior management
Coordinate and facilitates automation planning, design and execution sessions
Identify areas for improved testing efficiencies, test automation and implementation of automated test solution will fall within your scope
Create and implement automation Strategies for projects executed in Agile and Waterfall model
Work closely with Application developers, business team and testing team to identify automation requirements in early stage
Design and implement automation framework / strategies for web, mobile, windows and terminal emulators based applications
Help extending test coverage along with creating appropriate tools, utilities, and automation scripts that assist in functional testing and to create test data
Work closely with the Application owners and IT Staff to automate the current inventory of manual processesSkills requiredCompulsory Expertise in Python, Java, PowerShell, C-Sharp, SQL, Visual Basic, C+, and C object-oriented languages
Able to effectively multitask and manage priorities with little supervision.
Analytical skills & problem solving capability using research in available resources
Should possess good verbal, written communication skills and interpersonal skills.QualificationMust Have: Bachelor/Master’s degree in Engineering Preferably in Computer Science/Information science.
3 to 5 years of Applications development/Engineering expertise.JOB ID: HRD208895
Category: Engineering
